TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TcpStatistics extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供传输控制协议 (TCP) 统计数据。

span.span: Provides Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) statistical data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的实例由 和 方法返回，以使应用程序能够访问 TCP 流量信息。Instances of this class are returned by the and methods, to give applications access to TCP traffic information. 此类中的信息与中所述的管理信息对象相关联 [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt) 。The information in this class correlates to the management information objects described in [https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2012.txt). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示指定地址族的 TCP 统计信息。The following code example displays the TCP statistics for the specified address family. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CPP/netinfo.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfoReport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfoReport/CS/netinfo.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数只能由派生自类的类调用 。This constructor can be called only by classes that derive from the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ConnectionsAccepted As Long
public: abstract property long ConnectionsAccepted { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取接受的传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接请求数。

span.span: Gets the number of accepted Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests.

value.span: 值，指定接受的 TCP 连接请求的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connection requests accepted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式将此值定义为： "TCP 连接已从侦听状态直接转换到 RCVD 状态" 的次数。IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-RCVD state from the LISTEN state." ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ConnectionsInitiated As Long
public: abstract property long ConnectionsInitiated { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取由客户端发出的传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接请求数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection requests made by clients.

value.span: 值，指定由客户端启动的 TCP 连接的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connections initiated by clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式将此值定义为： "TCP 连接从已关闭状态直接转换到 SYN 发送状态的次数"。IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the SYN-SENT state from the CLOSED state." ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CumulativeConnections As Long
public: abstract property long CumulativeConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 指定建立的传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接的总数。

span.span: Specifies the total number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections established.

value.span: 值，指定建立的连接的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of connections established.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CurrentConnections As Long
public: abstract property long CurrentConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接数。

span.span: Gets the number of current Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定当前 TCP 连接的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of current TCP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式将此值定义为： "建立或关闭当前状态的 TCP 连接数"。IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT." ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ErrorsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long ErrorsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取收到的传输控制协议 (TCP) 错误数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) errors received.

value.span: 值，指定收到的 TCP 错误的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP errors received.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property FailedConnectionAttempts As Long
public: abstract property long FailedConnectionAttempts { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取失败的传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接尝试数。

span.span: Gets the number of failed Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connection attempts.

value.span: 值，指定失败的 TCP 连接尝试的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of failed TCP connection attempts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式将此值定义为： "TCP 连接已从 SYN 发送状态或 RCVD 状态直接转换到已关闭状态的次数"，以及 TCP 连接通过 RCVD 状态直接转换为 "侦听" 状态的次数的次数。IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the SYN-SENT state or the SYN-RCVD state, plus the number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the LISTEN state from the SYN-RCVD state." ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MaximumConnections As Long
public: abstract property long MaximumConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取支持的传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接的最大数。

span.span: Gets the maximum number of supported Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定可支持的 TCP 连接的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP connections that can be supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果最大连接数是动态的，则此属性返回-1。If the maximum number of connections is dynamic, this property returns -1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示超时值和最大连接信息。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MaximumTransmissionTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long MaximumTransmissionTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取传输控制协议 (TCP) 段的最大重新传输超时值。

span.span: Gets the maximum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.

value.span: 一个 值，指定 TCP 实现允许的重新传输超时值的最大毫秒数。

span.span: An value that specifies the maximum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当每个出站段传递到网络层 (IP) 时，TCP 会启动重新传输计时器。TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP). 如果在计时器过期前段中的数据未收到确认，则重新传输段。If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted. 可以将计时器设置为值与值之间的任何值 。The timer can be set to any value between the value and the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示超时值和最大连接信息。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property MinimumTransmissionTimeout As Long
public: abstract property long MinimumTransmissionTimeout { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取传输控制协议 (TCP) 段的最小重新传输超时值。

span.span: Gets the minimum retransmission time-out value for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments.

value.span: 一个 值，它指定重新传输超时值的 TCP 实现所允许的最小毫秒数。

span.span: An value that specifies the minimum number of milliseconds permitted by a TCP implementation for the retransmission time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当每个出站段传递到网络层 (IP) 时，TCP 会启动重新传输计时器。TCP starts a retransmission timer when each outbound segment is passed to the network layer (IP). 如果在计时器过期前段中的数据未收到确认，则重新传输段。If no acknowledgement is received for the data in the segment before the timer expires, the segment is retransmitted. 计时器可将计时器设置为值与值之间的任何值 。The timer The timer can be set to any value between the value and the value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示超时值和最大连接信息。The following code example displays time-out and maximum connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#5)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ResetConnections As Long
public: abstract property long ResetConnections { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取传输控制协议 (TCP) 连接收到的 RST 数据包数。

span.span: Gets the number of RST packets received by Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) connections.

value.span: 值，指定重置 TCP 连接的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of reset TCP connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IETF RFC 2012 正式将此值定义为： "TCP 连接从已建立状态或等待状态直接转换到已关闭状态的次数"。IETF RFC 2012 formally defines this value as, "The number of times TCP connections have made a direct transition to the CLOSED state from either the ESTABLISHED state or the CLOSE-WAIT state." ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了连接信息。The following code example displays connection information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property ResetsSent As Long
public: abstract property long ResetsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送时设置了重置标志的传输控制协议 (TCP) 段数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent with the reset flag set.

value.span: 值，指定发送时设置了重置标志的 TCP 段的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent with the reset flag set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 TCP 标头中的 reset (RST) 控制位指定 TCP 重置。TCP resets are specified using the reset (RST) control bit in the TCP header. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示段信息。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsReceived As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsReceived { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取收到的传输控制协议 (TCP) 段数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments received.

value.span: 值，指定收到的 TCP 段的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据包括在当前建立的连接上收到错误和段的段。This data includes segments with errors and segments received on currently established connections. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示段信息。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsResent As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsResent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取重新发送的传输控制协议 (TCP) 段数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments re-sent.

value.span: 值，指定重新传输的 TCP 段的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments retransmitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未确认在目标处接收的 TCP 段会重新传输。TCP segments that are not acknowledged as being received at the destination are retransmitted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示段信息。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property SegmentsSent As Long
public: abstract property long SegmentsSent { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取发送的传输控制协议 (TCP) 段数。

span.span: Gets the number of Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) segments sent.

value.span: 值，指定发送的 TCP 段的总数。

span.span: An value that specifies the total number of TCP segments sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数据包括为当前建立的连接发送的段，但不包括只包含重新传输的八进制数的段。This data includes segments sent for currently established connections but does not include segments containing only retransmitted octets. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示段信息。The following code example displays segment information. [!code-cpp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CPP/networkexamples.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/CS/networkexamples.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLNetInfo2#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLNetInfo2/VB/networkexamples.vb#7)]
